Text:
A version for the hardware impaired tanks a lot
A note how to play this as smooth as possible on older pc's:
Get the old Media Player Classic from http://sourceforge.net/projects/guliverkli2/ mpc-hc is better but uses more resources.
Use the internal mkv splitter and AC3 decoder and use CoreAVC
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6741689/
